sdo:itemDesc.dc:title: Typed letter from UE (unident sign) to Schenker, dated January 14, 1909
sdo:itemDesc.dc:description: [C. P. E. Bach: Keyboard Works & Handel: Organ Concertos:] Copy of each sent to Elisabeth Rudorff.
sdo:itemDesc.dc:subject: UE; Schenker, Heinrich; Rudorff, Elisabeth; complimentary copies; Bach, C. P. E. Bach; Keyboard Works; Handel; Organ Concertos

tei:p.tei:hi: Typed postcard from UE (unident sign) to Schenker, dated January 14, 1909

tei:transcription.tei:p: [ printed form, with typing: horizontal format:]
Bücherzettel. An Wohlgeboren / Herrn / Professor Dr. Heinrich Schenker Wien III Reisnerstr. 38
[ typed on printed lined card: upright format:]

Wir erlauben uns Ihnen höflichst mitzuteilen, dass Ihrem Wunsch gemäss an Frl. Elise Rudorff Elisabeth Rudorff, daughter of Ernst Rudorff. A letter from her dated January 11, 1909 (OJ 13/36, [1]) inquires about an Urtext edition of keyboard works of C. P. E. Bach, to which the present letter is undoubtedly an indirect response. 2 Werke unserer Universal Edition u.z. U.E. No. 548 UE548 = C.P.E. Bach Keyboard Works. und 936 UE936 = Handel Organ Concertos, vol.1. abgegangen sind.

Wien, am 14./1 1909 .................... Hochachtungsvoll [ printed address deleted by ........ “Universal-Edition” G. m. b. H. hand, and changed below to:] I. Wipplingerstrasse 32 ................. [ illeg. sign ]

tei:p.tei:hi: Typed postcard from UE (unident sign) to Schenker, dated January 14, 1909

tei:translation.tei:p: [ printed form, with typing: horizontal format:]
Book Order Form To: Professor Heinrich Schenker, Esq. Vienna III Reisnerstraße 38
[ typed on printed lined card: upright format:]
We take the liberty of informing you that, in accordance with your wishes, two works from our Universal Edition, viz. Nos. 548 and 936, have been dispatched to Miss Elise Rudorff.

Vienna, 14./1 1909 ...................... With kind regards, [ printed address deleted by ........ Universal Edition & Co. hand, and changed below to:] I. Wipplingerstrasse 32 ................. [ illeg. sign ]
